divs: Sighting Detailsthe UFO was just lights without shape, the light were symmetrical descending in a cone like shape like this ( < ) but the lines were broken up. The object was heading North, and was not going a fast speed it seemed. I only saw it when it appeared and then it flew across the sky for about 5 seconds then disappeared. It did not seem to far up in the stmosphere and was very clear. I have drew a picture of approdximetly what i saw, adn have dated it. I was very freaked out, and was only about two hosues away rfom my own, and after i watched it i ran home, and called my friend immediatly.
Summary: it was jsut lights without shape, the light were symmetrical descending in a cone.
